column5: Awesome Vid Simon!! Survival of the fittest.
Ya cool find Simon! That young bison didnt get any favours from that older one...Jerk...lol
what the hell was that? Thank god I don't have buddy's or family like that!. Talk about dragging you under the bus. Great video,nature can be cruel.

Great footage...great example of predator/prey mentality...those last few bison could have trampled the wolves....but in their panic did one of their own in.  Makes me wonder though....was it perceived as weakness and that's why the young one got rammed?  Was watching a hunting show on the weekend....guy puts an arrow through a muskox and as it's stumbling around, another muskox comes over and rams the snot out of it....mind you it was during the rut...so who knows.  COOOOL video though...much better than your musical selections as of late
